# GitHub Automation Docs

This folder contains the documentation for GitHub Actions workflows and deployment behavior.

## Files

- `WORKFLOWS.md`: full workflow reference (triggers, jobs, and dependencies)
- `DEPLOYMENT.md`: Cloudflare Pages deployment flow and troubleshooting

## Quick Navigation

- PR checks and CI behavior: see `WORKFLOWS.md`
- Release and publish behavior: see `DEPLOYMENT.md`

## Notes

- Workflow definitions live in `.github/workflows/`
- Helper scripts used by workflows live in `.github/scripts/`
- Keep this documentation in `.github/docs/` to avoid confusion with the repository root `README.md`
